title: Case Study: Big Data and Equity Investment Strategy
abstract: AmalgaMood amalgamates information from social media, micro-blogs, blogs, user generated content, and traditional media, then analyzes it from a financial market perspective in order to determine investment strategy. Its Mood Index successfully called the bear market of 2008â€“09 as well as the bull market that followed. Since early 2012, it has been bullish on global equities.

surveys.comments: Best business session of the week.  Kevin provided great insight and knowledge - more of these!
Very timely topic and innovative solution.
